summary: This is a brief email exchange between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and Stacey Richman, an attorney, confirming a meeting scheduled for October 28, 2019, regarding Mark Epstein. The email is part of the Epstein case document release.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Recipient of an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a meeting about Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of a meeting between an Assistant United States Attorney and defense attorney Stacey Richman.

connections.description: Stacey Richman is an attorney involved in a meeting regarding Mark Epstein, suggesting a legal representation or advisory role.

events.title: Meeting Regarding Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting scheduled for 3:00 p.m. between an Assistant United States Attorney and defense attorney Stacey Richman to discuss Mark Epstein.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was in communication with defense attorney Stacey Richman regarding Mark Epstein in October 2019.
A meeting was confirmed for October 28, 2019, at 3:00 p.m. to discuss Mark Epstein.
The email is part of the Epstein case document release, indicating ongoing legal proceedings or investigations involving Mark Epstein at that time.
